name: Bananas de Pijamas
overview: Bananas in Pajamas (Known as Bananas de Pijamas) is a pirate SNES hack of Chester Cheetah: Too Cool to Fool, made by Twin Eagles Group. This game was released in April 1998. It is based on a kids TV series by the same name. The TV series name is spelled in Portuguese in the game. When you start the game, it enters 'Level 3' instead of 'Level 1' from Chester Cheetah: Too Cool to Fool.
